menu.title: Our Menu
menu.item1.name: Watermelon Juice
menu.item1.desc: A refreshing blend of ripe watermelons, perfectly chilled to offer a sweet, hydrating escape on a sunny day. Its vibrant color and juicy flavor are sure to invigorate your senses.
menu.item2.name: Avocado Juice
menu.item2.desc: Creamy avocado juice, rich in texture and nutrients, offering a smooth, buttery taste with a hint of sweetness. A luxurious treat for health-conscious indulgence.
menu.item3.name: Soursop Juice
menu.item3.desc: Exotic soursop juice, boasting a unique combination of tangy and sweet flavors. This tropical delight is a perfect refresher with its creamy, citrusy essence.
menu.item4.name: Melon Juice
menu.item4.desc: Delight in the light and sweet taste of fresh melon juice. A perfect balance of sweetness and hydration, ideal for quenching your thirst on warm days.
menu.item5.name: Dragon Fruit Juice
menu.item5.desc: Experience the strikingly vibrant dragon fruit juice, packed with antioxidants and a mildly sweet taste. Its visually stunning hue is as enticing as its flavor.
menu.item6.name: Pineapple Juice
menu.item6.desc: Tropical pineapple juice, bursting with a bold, tangy sweetness. A classic favorite that brings a slice of paradise with every sip.
menu.item7.name: Mango Juice
menu.item7.desc: Succulent mango juice, rich and velvety, offering a vibrant tropical taste. Perfect for those who love a sweet, fruity burst of flavor.
menu.item8.name: Papaya Juice
menu.item8.desc: Indulge in the smooth, sweet flavor of papaya juice, a tropical delight that's both refreshing and nutritious.
menu.item9.name: Lemon Squash
menu.item9.desc: A zesty and refreshing lemon squash, perfect for revitalizing your senses. Its tangy flavor is balanced with just the right amount of sweetness.
menu.item10.name: Orange Squash
menu.item10.desc: Enjoy the vibrant taste of orange squash, a delightful blend of ripe oranges, offering a sweet and refreshing experience with every sip.
menu.item11.name: Happy Soda
menu.item11.desc: A unique and playful concoction, Happy Soda mixes traditional soda with a twist of local flavors, creating a fun and fizzy drink to uplift your mood.
menu.item12.name: Ice Tea
menu.item12.desc: A classic favorite, our ice tea is a refreshing blend of tea and sugar, offering a crisp and sweet taste that's perfect for any occasion.
menu.item13.name: Sweet Orange Juice
menu.item13.desc: Freshly squeezed sweet orange juice, full of natural goodness and vibrant citrus flavors. A delightful way to start your day or refresh your afternoon.
menu.item14.name: Lemon Orange Juice
menu.item14.desc: A delightful blend of tangy lemon and sweet orange, this juice offers a perfect balance of sour and sweet, making it an invigorating choice.
menu.item15.name: Chinese Tea
menu.item15.desc: Experience the subtle elegance of Chinese tea, known for its delicate flavors and aromatic infusion. A serene choice for tea connoisseurs.
menu.item16.name: Ice Basil Tea
menu.item16.desc: Refresh yourself with our ice basil tea, a unique blend that combines the coolness of ice with the sweet, peppery notes of basil. A perfect fusion of flavors.
menu.item17.name: Ice Lemon Tea
menu.item17.desc: Cool down with our ice lemon tea, a classic favorite infused with the crisp, tart flavor of fresh lemons, balanced with a sweet undertone.
menu.item18.name: Coca-Cola
menu.item18.desc: Enjoy the world-famous Coca-Cola, a timeless beverage loved for its unique taste and refreshing experience. Perfect for any occasion.
menu.item19.name: Sprite
menu.item19.desc: Sprite, the clear, lemon-lime soda, offers a crisp, refreshing taste that's a delightful escape from the ordinary.
menu.item20.name: Fanta
menu.item20.desc: Dive into the fruity world of Fanta, known for its bubbly charm and a variety of fun flavors. A vibrant and playful soda choice.
menu.item21.name: Green Sands
menu.item21.desc: Green Sands, an intriguing non-alcoholic beverage, offers a unique and refreshing taste that stands out with its subtle, herbal undertones.
menu.item22.name: Soda Water
menu.item22.desc: Soda Water, the simple yet versatile choice, perfect for a refreshing drink on its own or as a mixer for your favorite cocktail.
menu.item23.name: Mineral Water
menu.item23.desc: Pure and simple, our Mineral Water is sourced from natural springs, offering a crisp and clean taste to quench your thirst.
menu.item74.name: Fried Chicken with Butter Sauce
menu.item74.desc: Savor the rich and creamy butter sauce enveloping every piece of our crispy fried chicken. The luscious buttery flavors paired with the tender chicken creates an unforgettable experience.
menu.item75.name: Fried Chicken with Dried Chilies
menu.item75.desc: A spicy treat for the adventurous palate, our chicken is fried to perfection and tossed with fiery dried chilies. A burst of heat with every bite!
menu.item76.name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
menu.item76.desc: Discover the perfect balance of tangy and sweet with our succulent chicken pieces, coated in a vibrant sweet and sour sauce. A classic favorite that never disappoints.
menu.item77.name: Chicken sauteed with Cashew Nuts
menu.item77.desc: Indulge in a delightful combination of crunchy cashews and tender chicken, saut√©ed to perfection in a savory sauce. A dish that promises both texture and taste.
menu.item78.name: Chicken 'Rica-Rica'
menu.item78.desc: For those seeking a spicy thrill, our 'Rica-Rica' chicken offers a tantalizing blend of spices and herbs, ensuring an explosion of flavors with each mouthful.
menu.item79.name: Nanjing style Fried Chicken
menu.item79.desc: Experience a piece of Nanjing with our crispy fried chicken, seasoned with a mix of traditional spices and herbs, capturing the essence of this ancient city's culinary heritage.
menu.item80.name: Steamed Ginger Chicken
menu.item80.desc: Relish the gentle flavors of chicken steamed with aromatic ginger. A wholesome dish that's both light and bursting with natural goodness.
menu.item81.name: Lemon Chicken
menu.item81.desc: A symphony of zesty lemon and tender chicken, our Lemon Chicken is a refreshing blend of tangy citrus flavors complemented by the succulence of perfectly cooked chicken.
menu.item82.name: Shanghai Fried Chicken
menu.item82.desc: Transport your senses to the bustling streets of Shanghai with our crispy fried chicken, seasoned with a secret blend of spices unique to the region.
menu.item83.name: Cantonese Chicken
menu.item83.desc: Experience Cantonese culinary excellence with our signature chicken dish, slow-cooked to perfection, and flavored with the finest ingredients from Southern China.
menu.item84.name: Fried Chicken with Black Mushrooms
menu.item84.desc: Dive into a culinary delight as earthy black mushrooms meet crispy fried chicken, creating a symphony of textures and flavors that's both rich and comforting.
menu.item85.name: Fried Chicken and Salted Egg
menu.item85.desc: A unique fusion of crispy chicken and savory salted egg, this dish is a testament to the wonders of culinary innovation. Every bite is a delightful surprise.
menu.item86.name: Hot Chili Sauce Chicken
menu.item86.desc: For lovers of heat, our chicken bathed in hot chili sauce offers a fiery delight, ensuring a sizzling sensation that's both spicy and scrumptious.
